articles.title: Blockchain and its importance in the current cyber war
articles.description: A digital infrastructure platform could be the next tool in cyber warfare as trust declines and tensions increase between global powers, writes Paul Budde. WE RECENTLY TALKED about cyber warfare and cybersecurity. It is with some reluctance that I say this, b…
